amendment.description: Amendment provides $3 million to fund programs under the Women's Educational Equity Act of 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $3 million in funding for the Women's Educational Equity Act of 2001.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mrs. Maloney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
